name: DoVi Remux
description: Remuxes media with Dolby Vision profile 8.1 metadata from MKV to MP4, for better support on LG WebOS TVs

versions.changelog:
- Removed the default task trigger
- Removed the post-scan task which merges remuxed versions
- Added support for multiple and non-English audio streams
- Added a configuration page

- Fixed the remuxed audio stream missing its language metadata
- Fixed "file exists" errors on temporary/final paths for various scenarios
- Fixed temporary file being left behind and freezing FFmpeg if a previous run failed midway
- Fixed remuxed items still appearing as duplicates in the UI
